say_hello[source]

say_hello(to:str)

Say hello to somebody.

to: Who to say helo to Returns a salutation to

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
display(HTML(say_hello("Sylvain")))
Hello Sylvain! ðŸ‘‹
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert say_hello("World") == "Hello <b>World</b>! ðŸ‘‹"
{% endraw %}

say_goodbye[source]

say_goodbye(to:str)

Say goodbye to somebody.

to: Who to say helo to
